> I am a begineer I tried some small examples in junit and manage to run
them but now
> when I am trying to test servlet class methods  and facing problems can
anyone tell me
> how to tell servlet calss methods in junit testing.

There are a number of options for testing servlets.  Here are a few:

http://htmlunit.sf.net
http://httpunit.sf.net
http://jakarta.apache.org/cactus

For more options, visit http://junit.org.  They have a large list of testing
APIs.

Mike
